channel.title: RSCD Anti Botting
channel.description:
Hello,
Well this is just a basic thing I've wrote up for mods to check if the player is botting or not, by answering simple questions were they are at the present time.
Basicly it will disable the player clicking and sending packets, the player would be aloud to send packets but the server detects that there in the Random Question screen and doesn't allow it to go throw
You got 250 seconds to answer the question before you get logged out and returned Answer Never Answered or answer is incorrect and you will not be aloud to login the game till you go to the website and complete a question form.
Format: ::Question USER, Question to ask, ANSWER1,ANSWER2,ANSWER3,ANSWER4, ID of the correct answer Picture: [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2zi92k3.png[/img]
Video: http://rscbot.net/BotProtection/

item.title: RSCD Anti Botting
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“Asylum, post:22, topic:360061”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=456500.msg3346336#msg3346336 date=1284863540]
Ill just make a bot that when the question appears it logs out.
[/quote]

Yeah… That’s not obvious at all.[/quote]

If you were the only one who had it, it wouldnt be “that” obvious

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD Anti Botting
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:14, topic:360061”][quote author=dimebagx link=topic=456500.msg3341699#msg3341699 date=1284425688]
That looks pretty awesome,
why not have a random equation, say, what is random * 500 + random * 50, like (320 + 18) and then have the answer being
the value of the question? along with 3 other incorrect answers, and have it done automaticly but only to specific people? I dunno, determine it by whatever youd determine a botter by
[/quote]

Because you can have a bot parse the string, and solve the problem…[/quote]

Oh good point, it’d have to be a question then eh

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD Anti Botting
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

it’s an alright idea disabling clicking and seeing if they are still clicking, however many bots can bypass this, it all comes down to questions made up on the fly and if they can answer them or not. then even in that situation there could be a sleepwalker thing setup and have others answer. THERE IS NO REAL WAY TO STOP BOTS, EVER, PERIOD.

i was on WoW the other day, yes the biggest online game, Blizzard the richest gaming company (or nearby) i was in stormwind a main town, when about 20 level 1 characters fell from the sky with random names, and assembled them selves into positions in half a second, to spell out the words of a gold farming website.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hm_wtf_lol_xD wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:2, topic:360061”]What stops them from programming the bot to solve these?[/quote]Mods send a question to them I.E

Question: Were are we? falador, edge, Lumby, draynor

Or maths questions or what’s the right spelling out of this blah blah blah

get on rsce vent

item.title: RSCD Anti Botting
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

What stops them from programming the bot to solve these?

All the math ones would be easy, colors would be a tad trickier… At that point you’re starting to run out of questions to ask.

Read full topic
